<div class="clearfix"></div>
<div class="hidden-xs">
<h3 class="logotext">VOLKSWAGEN, Did you know?</h3>
<p>Few know that the Volkswagen Beatle – the basis of the German Manufacturer’s worldwide success, is very much a British success story.  Ivan Hirst, a British Army Officer found the pre-war draft designs of the first ‘Beatle’ in a bombed out factory Wolfsburg.  He drove the development of the factory and was instrumental in the early success of the car company.  We have 4065 Volkswagen car reviews with an average rating of 4.3.Find out more about Ivan Hirst follow this link and watch a rare video interview <a href="http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=snA7z7mUINQ" rel="external">http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=snA7z7mUINQ</a></p>
<p>Volkswagen comes 9th out of all manufacturers in the National Car Awards.  This major make has the reputation for reliability and good build quality.  However not every model is a shining star.  The WeLoveAnyCar.com car review system means you can spot the good, the bad and the ugly.  For example, the new Beatle gets comments about being ‘cute’ but the engine on some models can be very “under powered.”</p>
<h3 class="logotext">VOLKSWAGEN, enthusiast?</h3>
<p><strong>Why not join others at :</strong> <a href="http://vwowners.club" target="_Blank">vwowners.club</a></p>
</div>
</div>

</div>
<div>

<div class="tab-pane" role="tabpanel" id="step3">

<div class="step2lockup">
<div class="row">

<a href="#car-selector" class="padding10 size12 background-black white top-rc bottom-rc">Review Search</a>

<div class="clearfix"></div>
<div class="hidden-xs">
<h3 class="logotext">VOLKSWAGEN, Did you know?</h3>
<p>Few know that the Volkswagen Beatle – the basis of the German Manufacturer’s worldwide success, is very much a British success story.  Ivan Hirst, a British Army Officer found the pre-war draft designs of the first ‘Beatle’ in a bombed out factory Wolfsburg.  He drove the development of the factory and was instrumental in the early success of the car company.  We have 4065 Volkswagen car reviews with an average rating of 4.3.Find out more about Ivan Hirst follow this link and watch a rare video interview <a href="http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=snA7z7mUINQ" rel="external">http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=snA7z7mUINQ</a></p>
<p>Volkswagen comes 9th out of all manufacturers in the National Car Awards.  This major make has the reputation for reliability and good build quality.  However not every model is a shining star.  The WeLoveAnyCar.com car review system means you can spot the good, the bad and the ugly.  For example, the new Beatle gets comments about being ‘cute’ but the engine on some models can be very “under powered.”</p>
<h3 class="logotext">VOLKSWAGEN, enthusiast?</h3>
<p><strong>Why not join others at :</strong> <a href="http://vwowners.club" target="_Blank">vwowners.club</a></p>
</div>
</div>
<!--end col1-->

<li class="padding2 border-bottom-black1">
<div itemprop="review" itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review">
<div>
<span itemprop="itemReviewed"><strong class="logotext normal">VOLKSWAGEN</strong> GOLF DIESEL HATCHBACK [2010]</span>
</div>
<div>
<span itemprop="reviewBody">Brilliant car....returns 55+MPG &amp; the build quality is fantastic. The DSG gearbox is precise &amp; smooth, I can&#39;t see why you would opt for a manual version. This car can&#39;t be faulted in any way apart from the drivers seat being a little hard !!  I expect residuals to be class leading. Service intervals are long &amp; cost reasonable. Buy one, you wont be disappointed.</span>
<meta itemprop="author" content="M.B." />
</div>
<div class="sprite smallrate5 replace">

                    5.00
                </span>

<span class="size8">5 out of 5 - Updating Location Driver</span>
</div>

</div>

<div class="col-sm-3">
<label for="Postcode">Postcode</label>
</div>
<div class="col-sm-5">
<input class="form-control" data-val="true" data-val-regex="Postcode Invalid." data-val-regex-pattern="([a-pr-uwyzA-PR-UWYZ]([1-9]([0-9]|[a-hpjkstuwA-HPJKSTUW])?|[a-hk-yA-HK-Y][1-9]([0-9]|[abehmnprvwxyABEHMNPRVWXY])?) *[0-9][abd-hjlnp-uw-zABD-HJLNP-UW-Z]{2}|girGIR *0aaAA)" data-val-required="Please enter your postcode" id="Postcode" name="Postcode" style="text-transform: uppercase;" type="text" value="" />
</div>
<div class="col-sm-4">
<span class="field-validation-valid" data-valmsg-for="Postcode" data-valmsg-replace="true"></span>
</div>
</div>
<div class="row">
<p>
                                                We will send you an email to confirm that you left this review.
                                                Simply click on the link and your review will be published as soon as possible.
                                            </p>
</div>
<div class="row">
<ul class="list-inline">
<li>

</li>

</li>

</div>
</div>
</div>
</form> </div><!-- close step 4 -->
</div>

<div class="hidden-xs">
<h3 class="logotext">VOLKSWAGEN, Did you know?</h3>
<p>Few know that the Volkswagen Beatle – the basis of the German Manufacturer’s worldwide success, is very much a British success story.  Ivan Hirst, a British Army Officer found the pre-war draft designs of the first ‘Beatle’ in a bombed out factory Wolfsburg.  He drove the development of the factory and was instrumental in the early success of the car company.  We have 4065 Volkswagen car reviews with an average rating of 4.3.Find out more about Ivan Hirst follow this link and watch a rare video interview <a href="http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=snA7z7mUINQ" rel="external">http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=snA7z7mUINQ</a></p>
<p>Volkswagen comes 9th out of all manufacturers in the National Car Awards.  This major make has the reputation for reliability and good build quality.  However not every model is a shining star.  The WeLoveAnyCar.com car review system means you can spot the good, the bad and the ugly.  For example, the new Beatle gets comments about being ‘cute’ but the engine on some models can be very “under powered.”</p>
<h3 class="logotext">VOLKSWAGEN, enthusiast?</h3>
<p><strong>Why not join others at :</strong> <a href="http://vwowners.club" target="_Blank">vwowners.club</a></p>
</div>

<div class="clearfix"></div>
<div class="hidden-xs">
<h3 class="logotext">VOLKSWAGEN, Did you know?</h3>
<p>Few know that the Volkswagen Beatle – the basis of the German Manufacturer’s worldwide success, is very much a British success story.  Ivan Hirst, a British Army Officer found the pre-war draft designs of the first ‘Beatle’ in a bombed out factory Wolfsburg.  He drove the development of the factory and was instrumental in the early success of the car company.  We have 4065 Volkswagen car reviews with an average rating of 4.3.Find out more about Ivan Hirst follow this link and watch a rare video interview <a href="http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=snA7z7mUINQ" rel="external">http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=snA7z7mUINQ</a></p>
<p>Volkswagen comes 9th out of all manufacturers in the National Car Awards.  This major make has the reputation for reliability and good build quality.  However not every model is a shining star.  The WeLoveAnyCar.com car review system means you can spot the good, the bad and the ugly.  For example, the new Beatle gets comments about being ‘cute’ but the engine on some models can be very “under powered.”</p>
<h3 class="logotext">VOLKSWAGEN, enthusiast?</h3>
<p><strong>Why not join others at :</strong> <a href="http://vwowners.club" target="_Blank">vwowners.club</a></p>
</div>
</div>

<span class="field-validation-valid" data-valmsg-for="Recommend" data-valmsg-replace="false" id="Recommend_validation">Please ensure all Star Ratings are set.</span>
</div>
<div class="row">
<div class="col-xs-12">
<textarea cols="20" data-val="true" data-val-length="Please leave us your honest car review." data-val-length-max="480" id="NewComment" maxlength="480" name="NewComment" placeholder="Please add your comments to highlight your experiences with this car and help other readers understand your ratings and opinion. [Max 480 characters!]" rows="3">
</textarea>
<span class="field-validation-valid" data-valmsg-for="NewComment" data-valmsg-replace="true"></span>
</div>
</div>
<div class="row">
<ul class="list-inline">
<li>
<button type="button" class="btn btn-primary prev-step" id="backFromComments"><span class="glyphicon glyphicon-chevron-left"></span> Go Back</button>
</li>
<li>
<button type="button" class="btn btn-primary next-step" id="confirmComments">
                                                    &nbsp;Next&nbsp;&nbsp; <span class="glyphicon glyphicon-chevron-right"></span>
</button>
</li>
</ul>
</div>
<div class="row">
<br />
<p>(please be nice and do not use obscenities that would prevent your review being published)</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div><!-- close step 3 -->

<div class="hidden-xs">
<h3 class="logotext">VOLKSWAGEN, Did you know?</h3>
<p>Few know that the Volkswagen Beatle – the basis of the German Manufacturer’s worldwide success, is very much a British success story.  Ivan Hirst, a British Army Officer found the pre-war draft designs of the first ‘Beatle’ in a bombed out factory Wolfsburg.  He drove the development of the factory and was instrumental in the early success of the car company.  We have 4065 Volkswagen car reviews with an average rating of 4.3.Find out more about Ivan Hirst follow this link and watch a rare video interview <a href="http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=snA7z7mUINQ" rel="external">http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=snA7z7mUINQ</a></p>
<p>Volkswagen comes 9th out of all manufacturers in the National Car Awards.  This major make has the reputation for reliability and good build quality.  However not every model is a shining star.  The WeLoveAnyCar.com car review system means you can spot the good, the bad and the ugly.  For example, the new Beatle gets comments about being ‘cute’ but the engine on some models can be very “under powered.”</p>
<h3 class="logotext">VOLKSWAGEN, enthusiast?</h3>
<p><strong>Why not join others at :</strong> <a href="http://vwowners.club" target="_Blank">vwowners.club</a></p>

<li class="padding2 border-bottom-black1">
<div itemprop="review" itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review">
<div>
<span itemprop="itemReviewed"><strong class="logotext normal">VOLKSWAGEN</strong> GOLF DIESEL HATCHBACK [2010]</span>
</div>
<div>
<span itemprop="reviewBody">My only criticism after 3 years of driving is that the automatic gearbox is not quite as smooth as I would wish it to be on hill starts.  Otherwise it is a great little runner with plenty of room for passengers in the back seats.</span>
<meta itemprop="author" content=" . ." />
</div>
<div class="sprite smallrate5 replace">
<span>
                    5.00
                </span>
</div>
<span class="size8">5 out of 5 - Elmbridge Driver</span>
</div>
<div>
<div class="hidden-xs">
<a href="https://www.carland.com/home/search?Manufacturer=VOLKSWAGEN&amp;Model=GOLF" class="btn btn-action btn-xs pull-right " target="_blank">Find GOLF&#39;s for sale</a>
</div>
<div class="pull-left margin-0">
<meta itemprop="url" content="http://www.weloveanycar.comvolkswagen/golf-diesel-hatchback/my-only-criticism-after-3-years-of-driving-is-that-314758" />
<a href="javascript:void();" data-reviewid="314758" class="report">Report Review</a>

<span itemprop="itemReviewed"><strong class="logotext normal">VOLKSWAGEN</strong> GOLF DIESEL HATCHBACK [2010]</span>
</div>
<div>
<span itemprop="reviewBody">This was a brilliant carm which delivered almost 50k of reliable and economic motoring, with the extra pawer for overtaking and hill-climing especially useful. It had the adaptive suspension and a 510 sat nav system. Excellent long-distance car (We visited places as far apart as Styria, Tuscany, The Swiss Alps, Berlin, Wolfsburg, The Black Forest and Provence in it). The extra power proved especially useful on German Autobahns, enabling it to cruise at well over 100 mph, with ease. Needless to say it was replaced by the latest Mk7 version of the same, which is even better!</span>

</select>
<input id="VRM" name="VRM" type="hidden" value="enter your car registration" /> <div class="clearfix"></div>
</div>
</form></dd>
</dl>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="row">
<div class="col-xs-12">
<div class="border-bottom-black1 margin-bottom2">
<div class="pull-right">

<div class="hidden-xs">
<h3 class="logotext">VOLKSWAGEN, Did you know?</h3>
<p>Few know that the Volkswagen Beatle – the basis of the German Manufacturer’s worldwide success, is very much a British success story.  Ivan Hirst, a British Army Officer found the pre-war draft designs of the first ‘Beatle’ in a bombed out factory Wolfsburg.  He drove the development of the factory and was instrumental in the early success of the car company.  We have 4065 Volkswagen car reviews with an average rating of 4.3.Find out more about Ivan Hirst follow this link and watch a rare video interview <a href="http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=snA7z7mUINQ" rel="external">http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=snA7z7mUINQ</a></p>
<p>Volkswagen comes 9th out of all manufacturers in the National Car Awards.  This major make has the reputation for reliability and good build quality.  However not every model is a shining star.  The WeLoveAnyCar.com car review system means you can spot the good, the bad and the ugly.  For example, the new Beatle gets comments about being ‘cute’ but the engine on some models can be very “under powered.”</p>
<h3 class="logotext">VOLKSWAGEN, enthusiast?</h3>
<p><strong>Why not join others at :</strong> <a href="http://vwowners.club" target="_Blank">vwowners.club</a></p>
</div>

<dl class="hidden-sm hidden-md hidden-lg margin0">
<a href="#car-selector" class="padding10 size12 background-black white top-rc bottom-rc">Review Search</a>

<div class="clearfix"></div>
<div class="hidden-xs">
<h3 class="logotext">VOLKSWAGEN, Did you know?</h3>
<p>Few know that the Volkswagen Beatle – the basis of the German Manufacturer’s worldwide success, is very much a British success story.  Ivan Hirst, a British Army Officer found the pre-war draft designs of the first ‘Beatle’ in a bombed out factory Wolfsburg.  He drove the development of the factory and was instrumental in the early success of the car company.  We have 4065 Volkswagen car reviews with an average rating of 4.3.Find out more about Ivan Hirst follow this link and watch a rare video interview <a href="http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=snA7z7mUINQ" rel="external">http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=snA7z7mUINQ</a></p>
<p>Volkswagen comes 9th out of all manufacturers in the National Car Awards.  This major make has the reputation for reliability and good build quality.  However not every model is a shining star.  The WeLoveAnyCar.com car review system means you can spot the good, the bad and the ugly.  For example, the new Beatle gets comments about being ‘cute’ but the engine on some models can be very “under powered.”</p>
<h3 class="logotext">VOLKSWAGEN, enthusiast?</h3>
<p><strong>Why not join others at :</strong> <a href="http://vwowners.club" target="_Blank">vwowners.club</a></p>
</div>
</div>

<div class="hidden-xs">
<h3 class="logotext">VOLKSWAGEN, Did you know?</h3>
<p>Few know that the Volkswagen Beatle – the basis of the German Manufacturer’s worldwide success, is very much a British success story.  Ivan Hirst, a British Army Officer found the pre-war draft designs of the first ‘Beatle’ in a bombed out factory Wolfsburg.  He drove the development of the factory and was instrumental in the early success of the car company.  We have 4065 Volkswagen car reviews with an average rating of 4.3.Find out more about Ivan Hirst follow this link and watch a rare video interview <a href="http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=snA7z7mUINQ" rel="external">http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=snA7z7mUINQ</a></p>
<p>Volkswagen comes 9th out of all manufacturers in the National Car Awards.  This major make has the reputation for reliability and good build quality.  However not every model is a shining star.  The WeLoveAnyCar.com car review system means you can spot the good, the bad and the ugly.  For example, the new Beatle gets comments about being ‘cute’ but the engine on some models can be very “under powered.”</p>
<h3 class="logotext">VOLKSWAGEN, enthusiast?</h3>
<p><strong>Why not join others at :</strong> <a href="http://vwowners.club" target="_Blank">vwowners.club</a></p>
</div>

<div class="hidden-xs">
<h3 class="logotext">VOLKSWAGEN, Did you know?</h3>
<p>Few know that the Volkswagen Beatle – the basis of the German Manufacturer’s worldwide success, is very much a British success story.  Ivan Hirst, a British Army Officer found the pre-war draft designs of the first ‘Beatle’ in a bombed out factory Wolfsburg.  He drove the development of the factory and was instrumental in the early success of the car company.  We have 4065 Volkswagen car reviews with an average rating of 4.3.Find out more about Ivan Hirst follow this link and watch a rare video interview <a href="http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=snA7z7mUINQ" rel="external">http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=snA7z7mUINQ</a></p>
<p>Volkswagen comes 9th out of all manufacturers in the National Car Awards.  This major make has the reputation for reliability and good build quality.  However not every model is a shining star.  The WeLoveAnyCar.com car review system means you can spot the good, the bad and the ugly.  For example, the new Beatle gets comments about being ‘cute’ but the engine on some models can be very “under powered.”</p>
<h3 class="logotext">VOLKSWAGEN, enthusiast?</h3>
<p><strong>Why not join others at :</strong> <a href="http://vwowners.club" target="_Blank">vwowners.club</a></p>
</div>
</div>

<!-- STEP 2-->
<div class="tab-pane" role="tabpanel" id="step2">
<div class="add-review-container">
<h2>Confirm your car details</h2>
<div class="step2lockup">
<div class="row">
<div class="col-sm-6">
<input class="staticreg" id="VRM" name="VRM" placeholder="VRM unknown" readonly="readonly" type="text" value="" />
<img class="img-responsive hidden-xs" alt="thumb" />
</div>
<div class="col-sm-6">
<a href="#" class="nomatch" onclick="$('#step1').first().addClass('active').show(); $('#step2').first().removeClass('active');">Details do not match my car</a>
<h4 id="step2Year">1</h4>
<h4 id="step2CarDetails"> </h4>

<div class="clearfix"></div>
<div class="hidden-xs">
<h3 class="logotext">VOLKSWAGEN, Did you know?</h3>
<p>Few know that the Volkswagen Beatle – the basis of the German Manufacturer’s worldwide success, is very much a British success story.  Ivan Hirst, a British Army Officer found the pre-war draft designs of the first ‘Beatle’ in a bombed out factory Wolfsburg.  He drove the development of the factory and was instrumental in the early success of the car company.  We have 4065 Volkswagen car reviews with an average rating of 4.3.Find out more about Ivan Hirst follow this link and watch a rare video interview <a href="http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=snA7z7mUINQ" rel="external">http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=snA7z7mUINQ</a></p>
<p>Volkswagen comes 9th out of all manufacturers in the National Car Awards.  This major make has the reputation for reliability and good build quality.  However not every model is a shining star.  The WeLoveAnyCar.com car review system means you can spot the good, the bad and the ugly.  For example, the new Beatle gets comments about being ‘cute’ but the engine on some models can be very “under powered.”</p>
<h3 class="logotext">VOLKSWAGEN, enthusiast?</h3>
<p><strong>Why not join others at :</strong> <a href="http://vwowners.club" target="_Blank">vwowners.club</a></p>
</div>
</div>

</div>

<span class="field-validation-valid" data-valmsg-for="Surname" data-valmsg-replace="true"></span>
</div>
</div>

                                                We will send you an email to confirm that you left this review.
                                                Simply click on the link and your review will be published as soon as possible.

<div class="hidden-xs">
<h3 class="logotext">VOLKSWAGEN, Did you know?</h3>
<p>Few know that the Volkswagen Beatle – the basis of the German Manufacturer’s worldwide success, is very much a British success story.  Ivan Hirst, a British Army Officer found the pre-war draft designs of the first ‘Beatle’ in a bombed out factory Wolfsburg.  He drove the development of the factory and was instrumental in the early success of the car company.  We have 4065 Volkswagen car reviews with an average rating of 4.3.Find out more about Ivan Hirst follow this link and watch a rare video interview <a href="http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=snA7z7mUINQ" rel="external">http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=snA7z7mUINQ</a></p>
<p>Volkswagen comes 9th out of all manufacturers in the National Car Awards.  This major make has the reputation for reliability and good build quality.  However not every model is a shining star.  The WeLoveAnyCar.com car review system means you can spot the good, the bad and the ugly.  For example, the new Beatle gets comments about being ‘cute’ but the engine on some models can be very “under powered.”</p>
<h3 class="logotext">VOLKSWAGEN, enthusiast?</h3>
<p><strong>Why not join others at :</strong> <a href="http://vwowners.club" target="_Blank">vwowners.club</a></p>
</div>
